info.title: Shopping Cart
info.description: This is Swagger UI environment generated for the TMF Shopping Cart specification

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated properties to display in response

parameters.description: Requested index for start of resources to be provided in response

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Requested number of resources to be provided in response

parameters.name: shoppingCart
parameters.description: The Shopping Cart to be created

parameters.name: shoppingCart
parameters.description: The Shopping Cart to be updated

post.description: Sets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data containing the callback endpoint to deliver the information

delete.description: Resets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the registered listener

ShoppingCart.description: Shopping Cart resource is used for the temporarily selection and reservation of product offerings in e-commerce, call center and retail purchase. Shopping cart supports purchase of both physical and digital goods and service (e.g. handset, telecom network service). Shopping Cart contain list of cart items, a reference to customer (partyRole) or contact medium in case customer not exist, and the total items price including promotions

@baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type

href.description: Hyperlink to access the shopping cart

id.description: Unique identifier created on provider side (e.g. Order Capture system)

validFor.description: The period for which the shopping cart is valid (e.g. 90 if no activity or 7 days if cart is empty)

cartTotalPrice.description: Total amount of the shopping cart, usually of money, that represents the actual price paid by the Customer for cart (considering only "Active" cart items)

Shopping Cart resource is used for the temporarily selection and reservation of product offerings in e-commerce, call center and retail purchase. Shopping cart supports purchase of both physical and digital goods and service (e.g. handset, telecom network service). Shopping Cart contain list of cart items, a reference to customer (partyRole) or contact medium in case customer not exist, and the total items price including promotions

Shopping cart supports purchase of both physical and digital goods and service (e.g. handset, telecom network service). @baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type

TimePeriod.description: A base / value business entity used to represent a period of time between two timepoints.

endDateTime.description: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

startDateTime.description: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

ContactMedium.description: Indicates the contact medium that could be used to contact the party.

@baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type

preferred.description: If true, indicates that is the preferred contact medium

type.description: Type of the contact medium, such as: email address, telephone number, postal address

validFor.description: The time period that the contact medium is valid for

CartPrice.description: An amount, usually of money, that represents the actual price paid by the customer for this item. May represent the total price of the shopping cart or the total of the cart item depending on the relation

@baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail the semantics of this order item price.

name.description: A short descriptive name such as "Subscription price".

priceType.description: A category that describes the price, such as recurring, discount, allowance, penalty, and so forth

CartItem.description: An identified part of the shopping cart. A shopping cart  is decomposed into one or more shopping cart item. Cart item represents a product offering or bundled product offering that user wish to purchase, as well as the pricing of the product offering, reference to product in case of configured characteristic or installation address. Cart items can be related to other cart item to related bundled offerings or reference cart Items to a shipping options

@baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type

id.description: Identifier of the cart item (generally it is a sequence number 01, 02, 03, ...) in the shopping cart

RelatedPartyRef.description: RelatedParty reference. A related party defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

@referredType.description: Generic attribute indicating the name of the class type of the referred resource entity.

href.description: Reference of the related party, could be a party reference or a party role reference

id.description: Unique identifier of a related party

MediumCharacteristic.description: Describes the contact medium characteristics that could be used to contact a party (an individual or an organization)

emailAddress.description: Full email address in standard format

faxNumber.description: The fax number of the contact

phoneNumber.description: The primary phone number of the contact

Price.description: Provides all amounts (tax included, duty free, tax rate), used currency and percentage to apply for Price Alteration.

@baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type

dutyFreeAmount.description: All taxes excluded amount (expressed in the given currency)

taxIncludedAmount.description: All taxes included amount (expressed in the given currency)

PriceAlteration.description: Is an amount, usually of money, that modifies the price charged for an order item.

@baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type

applicationDuration.description: Duration during which the alteration applies on the order item price (for instance 2 months free of charge for the recurring charge)

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail the semantics of this order item price alteration

name.description: A short descriptive name such as "Monthly discount"

priceType.description: A category that describes the price such as recurring, one time and usage.

priority.description: Priority level for applying this alteration among all the defined alterations on the order item price

Money.description: A base / value business entity used to represent money

unit.description: Currency (ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency)

@baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type

Note.description: Extra information about a given entity

Product.description: Product reference. Configure the product characteristics (only configurable characteristics and necessary only if a non default value is selected) and/or identify the product that needs to be modified/deleted.

@baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@referredType.description: Indicates the type of the referred object. This attribute is to be used when the object is representing a reference to an existing object instead of the of the object itself.

@schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type

ProductOfferingRef.description: ProductOffering reference. A product offering represents entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog, this resource includes pricing information.

@referredType.description: Generic attribute indicating the name of the class type of the referred resource entity.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product offering

CartItemRelationship.description: Relationship among cart items mainly other than hierarchical relationships such as "RelyOn", "DependentOn", "Shipping" etc.

id.description: Unique identifier of the referred cart item

type.description: Type of the cart item relationship

ProductRelationship.description:
Linked products to the one instantiate, it can be :
  • "bundled" if the product is a bundle and you want to describe the "bundled" products inside this bundle
  • "reliesOn" if the product needs another already owned product to rely on (e.g. an option on an already owned mobile access product)
"targets" or "isTargeted" (depending on the way of expressing the link) for any other kind of links that may be useful

type.description:
Type of the product relationship. It can be :
  • "bundled" if the product is a bundle and you want to describe the "bundled" products inside this bundle
  • "reliesOn" if the product needs another already owned product to rely on (e.g. an option on an already owned mobile access product)
"targets" or "isTargeted" (depending on the way of expressing the link) for any other kind of links that may be useful

Place.description: Place defines a location generically. Could be a geographic address a geographic address, a geographic location.

@baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@referredType.description: Indicates the type of the referred object. This attribute is to be used when the object is representing a reference to an existing object instead of the of the object itself.

@schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type

name.description: A user-friendly name for the place, such as "Paris Store", "London Store", "Main Home"

role.description: Role of the place (for instance: 'home delivery', 'shop retrieval')

ProductCharacteristic.description: Characteristics of the product to instantiate or to modify

ProductSpecificationRef.description: Product specification reference: A ProductSpecification is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role.

@referredType.description: Generic attribute indicating the name of the class type of the referred resource entity.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product specification

CartItemRef.description: CartIIem reference. A CartItem is an identified part of the shopping cart.

@referredType.description: Generic attribute indicating the name of the class type of the referred resource entity.

id.description: Unique identifier of the cart item

reason.description: Text that explains the reason for error.

message.description: (optional) Text that provide more details and corrective actions related to the error.

referenceError.description: (optional) A URL to online documentation that provides more information about the error.

@type.description: (optional) The class type of a REST resource.

@schemaLocation.description: (optional) A link to the schema describing a REST resource.
